page.title: 07FOREST MERE,HEALTH FARM
page.content: James Chaplin originally owned the Forest Mere Estate and the surrounding acres of land/countryside. Mr Kenwood who is the founder of Kenwood Mixers etc bought the estate off James Chaplin. Kenwood developed the estate into a health farm. There are many facilities in Forest Mere such as golf, swimming, gym exercises, massages, and a solarium. The house is pretty and is built in front of the lake. the lake is large and has boating facilities. Film stars and Royalty have used the health farm. The Dutchess of Kent and Una Stubbs are two of many famous people who have been and used the health farm. Recently a documentary has been made about Forest Mere which resulted in mor popularity.
